name: Water Drop (Miles_Miles)
description:
Long ago, an ancient city in the clouds was inhibited by powerful beings. There were many that scattered the clouds however, the denizen that stood out the most was a bright girl who brought joy to anyone who was in her presence. She was always happy until one day when a terrible tragedy struck. At this moment, her first tear rolled down her cheek and fell down to earth. You are that drop of water.

Right and Left Arrow Keys to Move right and left

Press Up to splash up 

Press Down while up to splash down

Avoid the birds and collect the snowflakes.  Lightning will sometimes strike to distract you. Collect Lightning Flakes to speed up the process.

Credit to Celeste for splash up/down sound! Credit to Minecraft for Aria Math! Credit to Stardew Valley for Music Box Song

(Sorry about how this project is a little glitchy. It's my first game)
